getFirstUsersCommunityCards

public EncryptedCommunityCards getFirstUsersCommunityCards()
Gets the first community card decryption request users community cards. This function is only called by the host for protection in 2 player games.

Returns:
the first users community cards

                                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException,

decryptEncryptedHands

public void decryptEncryptedHands(RSAService rsaService,
                                  int numRequests)
                           throws org.avis.client.InvalidSubscriptionException,
                                  java.io.IOException
Asynchronous function - takes requests to decrypt an encrypted hand. THIS FUNCTION NEEDS TO BE CALLED BEFORE waitEncryptedHand().

Parameters:
rsaService - the rsa service
numRequests - the number of requests to accept
Throws:
org.avis.client.InvalidSubscriptionException - the invalid subscription exception
